LanguageData.VV_StatsReport_Mana_Desc: The amount of mana a arcane plant can store at maximum.
LanguageData.VV_StatsReport_ManaFlux_Desc: The daily mana fluctuation of this arcane plant. Mana can be produced by certain arcane plants when fertilized or under suitable conditions, and is not consumed when packaged.\nIf reserved mana is at maximum, any overproduced mana is transferred to adjacent connected arcane plants.
LanguageData.VV_StatsReport_ManaFluxRule_AdjacentPlan: {0} mana from each adjacent arcane plants\{0} mana from each adjacent plant propotional to its growth
LanguageData.VV_StatsReport_ManaFluxRule_AdjacentPoll: {0} mana if placed on polluted soil\n{1} mana from each adjacent polluted soil
LanguageData.VV_StatsReport_ManaFluxRule_AdjacentWate: {0} mana if placed on water\n{1} mana from each adjacent water
LanguageData.VV_StatsReport_ManaFluxRule_BatteryStore: {0} mana propotional to the charged rate
LanguageData.VV_StatsReport_ManaFluxRule_WeatherRainy: {0} mana if rains and no roofed
LanguageData.VV_StatsReport_ManaFluxRule_WeatherSnowy: {0} mana if snowy and no roofed
LanguageData.VV_StatsReport_ManaFluxRule_Wind_Desc: {0}~{1} mana propotional to the wind speed
